pullrequest.title: Support for gz11 testing in sdformat

content.raw:
When chaining pull requests, we may get in a situation where neither the src nor the dest branches are `gz11`, because PR2 builds on top of PR1 which itself targets `gz11`. This happened on [this pull request](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/pull-requests/461/gz11-add-copy-move-constructors-and/diff). 

Just a fun corner case, there could be a solution, maybe looking at the pipelines file, but I don't think it's worth it. We just need to keep it in mind though :wink:
content.html:
When chaining pull requests, we may get in a situation where neither the src nor the dest branches are gz11, because PR2 builds on top of PR1 which itself targets gz11. This happened on this pull request.

Just a fun corner case, there could be a solution, maybe looking at the pipelines file, but I don't think it's worth it. We just need to keep it in mind though
